# Check language

This is an helper function useful to check user input language to use in YABPstat calls do BPstat API.
    

  

```{r example-check_language, eval = FALSE}

 check_language(lang = "PT")

```

  

# Check Status Code

This is an helper function useful to check any connection errors to BPstat API using the YABPstat package.
    

  

```{r example-check_status_code}
#' \dontrun{
#' 
#'check_status_code(200)
#'
#' }
```

  

  





# Check BPstat API version

This is an helper function useful to check any errors from BPstat API using the YABPstat package due to a different version been deployed without previous warning to the developers. 
    

  

```{r example-check_api_version, eval = FALSE}
#' \dontrun{
#'check_api_version()
#' }
```

# ya_get_domain()

This function gathers information about BPstat domains located at "https://bpstat.bportugal.pt/data/v1/domains/?lang=PT" or "https://bpstat.bportugal.pt/data/v1/domains/?lang=EN"
    

  

```{r example-ya_get_domain}
#'\dontrun{
#'ya_get_domain()
#'}
```

  

  
<br>
<br>

# ya_save_domain()

This function allows saving the information about BPstat domains to an external file.
    

  

```{r example-ya_save_domain}
#'\dontrun{

#'}
```

  

  


# ya_get_dataset()

This function gathers information about BPstat domains located at "https://bpstat.bportugal.pt/data/v1/domains/{domain_id}/datasets/?lang=PT&page_size=100" or "https://bpstat.bportugal.pt/data/v1/domains/{domain_id}/datasets/?lang=EN&page_size=100"
    

  

```{r example-ya_get_dataset}
#'\dontrun{
#'ya_get_dataset()
#'}
```
